name: houseofwolves.serverlesslaunchpad
author: k-gar
description: Boiler plate project for serverless applications.

scripts.dev:clean: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Cleaning up stale development processes...' && (pkill -f 'vite.*moto' 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'tsx.*dev_server' 2>/dev/null || true) && echo 'âœ… Cleanup complete'
scripts.dev:check: echo 'ğŸ” Checking for port conflicts...' && (lsof -i :5173-5176,3001 2>/dev/null || echo 'âœ… No port conflicts detected')
scripts.dev:web:all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors cyan,teal,green,blue --names "MANTINE,SHADCN,DAISYUI,SVELTE" "npm run dev:web:mantine" "npm run dev:web:shadcn" "npm run dev:web:daisyui" "npm run dev:web:svelte"
scripts.dev:watch:packages: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors yellow,green,blue --names "TYPES,CORE,FRAMEWORK" "npm run dev:watch:types" "npm run dev:watch:core" "npm run dev:watch:framework"
scripts.dev: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting development servers...' && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors cyan,magenta --names "WEB,API" "npm run dev:web:mantine" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.dev:watch: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting all development servers with file watching...' && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors cyan,teal,green,blue,magenta,yellow,orange,red,white --names "MANTINE,SHADCN,DAISYUI,SVELTE,API,TYPES,CORE,FRAMEWORK,COGNITO" "npm run dev:web:mantine" "npm run dev:web:shadcn" "npm run dev:web:daisyui" "npm run dev:web:svelte" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:watch:types" "npm run dev:watch:core" "npm run dev:watch:framework" "docker logs -f serverlesslaunchpad-cognito-local 2>&1 | grep --line-buffered -v DEBUG"
scripts.dev:reset: npm run dev:clean && sleep 2 && npm run dev
